attributes.action: Free the unnamed marine who killed taliban prisoner
attributes.additional_details: Free the unnamed marine who has been sentenced to life for killing the taliban prisoner in Afghanistan.We expect our soldiers to keep us safe, but will not support them when they have seen horrors we can not even imagine.The taliban blow our boys up and hack them to death and the taliban are not penalized.The other side have no honour or compassion.Their aim is to kill all our boys.Like the unnamed marine said it's nothing they wouldn't do to our boys.We must support our brave soldiers.
